channel.title: CVE Feed for Stephanie Leary -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Stephanie Leary -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-31112|2024-08-02T01:46:04.618Z -- stephanie%20leary -- convert%20post%20types
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Stephanie Leary Convert Post Types allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Convert Post Types: from n/a through 1.4.
